articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Threatens to Deal Deadly Blows at S. Korean Group of Traitors
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Threatens to Deal Deadly Blows at S. Korean Group of Traitors
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1031 Friday in connection with the fact that the south Korean puppet forces have become all the more undisguised in their moves of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK.
					At a time when all the Koreans were celebrating the Day of the Sun, old riff-raffs of the "Association of Elderlies" and other ultra-right conservative gangsters went on the rampage in downtown Seoul, hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. This proves that the puppet conservative group's provocation farce has reached an intolerable phase, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					Despite their hideous crime, the puppet conservative villains do not hesitate to make the whole gamut of rubbish to justify their hideous acts.
					
					They called the ultimatum sent by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army "an act hardly understandable" and called on the army and people of the DPRK to make "decorous words and deeds" in reference to their will to take retaliation.
					
					The puppet military hooligans led by Kim Kwan Jin are coming out in a provocative way, threatening to "punish the north if it makes provocation under any pretext" following the ultimatum of the DPRK.
					
					All facts prove that the ultra-right hooligans' act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK was a deliberate and planned provocation to fan up confrontation with fellow countrymen, incite hostility and strain the situation, and that the puppet authorities are a chief culprit.
					
					While conniving at and defending the thrice-cursed treason, the puppet authorities are speaking loudly of "dialogue" in public. This makes the DPRK burn with indignation.
					
					The puppet group is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can go unpunished without making a word of apology for mangling the hearts of the army and people of the DPRK who regard the dignity of its supreme leadership as their life and soul.
					
					As they had already declared, they will deal retaliatory blows at those who hurt the dignity of their supreme leadership no matter wherever they are.
					
					The puppet group should clearly know that the moment of its most miserable end has come.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with a delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) headed by Ri Ki Sok, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Mongolian President Clarifies Stand to Boost Friendly Ties with DPRK
articles.content:
Mongolian President Clarifies Stand to Boost Friendly Ties with DPRK
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj met DPRK Ambassador to his country Hong Gyu on April 16 when the latter presented his credentials to the president.
					The president said that the Mongolian government and people will always remember President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who paid deep attention to the development of the Mongolia-DPRK friendly relations at all times.
					
					He expressed conviction that the bilateral friendly relations would grow stronger under the care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un in the future.
					
					It is the consistent stand of the Mongolian government to boost the Mongolia-DPRK friendly relations, he said.
					
					He supported the DPRK's policy to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Iranian Military Attache Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Military Attache Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Teadonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday to mark the Iranian Army Day.
					Present there on invitation were generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of various countries and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					Ambassador Mansour Chavoshi and staff members of the Iranian embassy were present there.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Figures of Peru, China
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Figures of Peru, China
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, and the director general of the Dandong Food and Oil Trade Co. Ltd. of China.
					The secretary general and the director general handed the gifts over to officials concerned of the DPRK on April 1 and 13.
					
					The secretary general said:
					
					The Juche idea is a beacon indicating the way to be followed by the progressive people struggling to realize the cause of global independence.
					
					President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and on its basis defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialisms and built people-centered socialist system in Korea.
					
					I present the gift to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung), convinced that he will lead the struggle for global independence to victory, invariably holding high the torch of Juche.
					
					The director general sincerely hoped the Korean people would build a thriving socialist nation at an early date, realize the cause of national reunification and lead a happier life under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian Political Party Leaders
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian Political Party Leaders
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a congratulatory message from General Chairwoman Megawati Soekarnoputri and Secretary General Tjahjo Kumolo of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle on April 9.
					The message said that all the members of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and all the Korean people on the occasion of the 101st birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the Korean people, which falls on April 15, 2013.
					
					Kim Il Sung was the father of nation-building who dedicated himself to socialist Korea, it noted.
					
					He is widely known as the great man who achieved the prosperity of the Korean nation and firmly adhered to the independence of the Korean people under the banner of the Juche idea, it said.
					
					It extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on this significant day when he was elected first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					It wished him good health and the Korean people success in the efforts to achieve the wellbeing of the Korean nation and peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world under his leadership.
					
					It hoped that the relations between the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and the WPK and between the Indonesian and Korean peoples would develop more favorably in the future.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Missions from Foreign Embassy and Personages
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Missions from Foreign Embassy and Personages
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A foreign embassy and various personages sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in relevant countries on April 10 and 15 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					They were the Venezuelan embassy in Beijing, the general director of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd and the chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China, Mohammad Aslam Malik, secretary general of the Punjab State Committee of the Workers' Party of Pakistan, Mohammad Aslam Nagi, chairperson of the Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Pakistan, Berkat Ullah, chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, and the representative of the Belgium branch of the Korean Friendship Association.

articles.title: Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea headed by Chairman Ramon Jimenez Lopez, Harish Gupta, director-general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party and the Indian delegation of Juche idea study organizations headed by Renu Khanna left here on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK People Inspired by Good Results at Int'l Games
articles.content:
DPRK People Inspired by Good Results at Int'l Games
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Athletes of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea proved successful in recent international games, including the 2013 World Short-Track Speed Skating Tournament for Development Cup of the International Skating Union and the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					The news has greatly encouraged the local people to bring innovation in production and construction.
					
					Ryo Pong Gil, a work-team head of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, told KCNA: 
					
					"Ri Se Gwang and Kim Jin Hyok snatched gold and silver medals at the 6th Competition for the Cup for Gymnastic Challengers of the International Gymnastic Federation in March after Kim Kum Ok won a gold medal at the 14th Asian Marathon Championship in February. Athletes of our country fully displayed the honor of Songun Korea in various international games in April, too.
					
					Their good results enhanced the productive zeal of the members of my work-team."
					
					Cha Sin Chol, a workshop head of the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, said:
					
					"The news about our athletes' successes at international games gives great delight and courage to us, workers. 
					
					I think the successes are based on their ardent patriotic will to remain true to the Workers' Party of Korea's plan for turning the country into a sports power. 
					
					Like them, we will fully display our patriotic zeal to boost production for betterment of people's living."

articles.title: 15th Kimilsungia Festival Closes
articles.content:
15th Kimilsungia Festival Closes
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The 15th Kimilsungia Festival closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Friday. The festival opened to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The venue of the festival was crowded with an endless stream of visitors every day as it presented spectacular scenery with flowers of the sun. They were exhibited by at least 80 units including armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel, people, school youth and children, overseas Koreans, foreign embassies and international bodies here, friendship and solidarity organizations, figures of all social standings, members of the societies for disseminating and supporting immortal flowers and Chinese residents in the DPRK.
					
					Present at the ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, officials of the armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army, Pyongyangites and overseas compatriots.
					
					Present there on invitation were Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Nasri Gustaman and foreign guests.
					
					Diplomas for top prize were conferred upon the KPA unit under Kim Song Dok, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					
					Diplomas for special prize went to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the Indonesian embassy here.
					
					Diplomas for best and excellent prizes and festival organization and art prizes were awarded to many units including the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Ministry of People's Security, the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and the Kyonghung Guidance Bureau.
					
					Dozens of service personnel, people, school youth and children, overseas compatriots, foreigners and Chinese residents received diplomas for prize of merit and participation certificates.
					
					Diplomas for prize of cultivation technology went to those cultivators of the units who distinguished themselves in cultivating Kimilsungias in a scientific and technological manner and exhibiting them.

articles.title: History of U.S. Aggression on Korea
articles.content:
History of U.S. Aggression on Korea
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists, together with the south Korean puppet forces, are now getting evermore hell-bent on the war exercises to attack the Democratic People's Republic of Korea by mobilizing even latest nuclear strike means.
					In fact, the U.S. has attempted to invade Korea from long ago.
					
					Regarding Korea as a bridgehead for its domination over Asia, the U.S. started its aggression on Korea with an intrusion of its warship General Sherman in 1866. The ship came up along the Taedong River in Pyongyang, perpetrating spying, murder and robbery, but was sunk by the heroic resistance of Koreans.
					
					Far from drawing a lesson in the sunken General Sherman case, the U.S. intruded its warships Shenandoah and China into Korea in 1868 and launched an invasion of it on a large scale in 1871, with involvement of fleets, including flagship Colorado.
					
					At the end of the Second World War, it occupied the southern half of Korea to divide the country into two and has since attempted to conquer the northern half by force.
					
					At last, the U.S. unleashed the Korean War in 1950 in a bid to realize its strategy for world supremacy. The aggressive nature of this war on the part of the U.S. imperialists was well evidenced by the following irrefutable facts:
					
					"Top secret document No. 4849" of the Information Research Bureau of the U.S. Department of State on January 28, 1949 said that in the light of Korea's geographical situation in Northeast Asia to control Korea and its people was of value to any other states interested in the Far East and it was beyond any doubt that Korea was very important for the U.S. from the political point of view.
					
					MacArthur, then commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East, was reported to say that Korea was like a bridgehead leading to the continent and that conquering the whole of Korea would help the U.S. forces cut off the only supply line linking Siberia of the Soviet Union with its southern parts and put the whole areas between Vladivostok and Singapore under the U.S. control.
					
					Anyhow, the three-year war ended in the defeat of the U.S. But, the U.S. imperialists did not give up their design for aggression. They committed armed provocations one after another to invade the DPRK, including intrusions of armed spy ship Pueblo and spy plane EC-121 and "Panmunjom" incident.
					
					In the new century, too, they have schemed to unleash a war any time while persistently straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula after designating the DPRK as the first target of their preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					To this end, military drills have been staged without letup in and around the peninsula.
					
					The Foal Eagle joint military exercises now under way in south Korea show that the U.S. imperialists' scheme to stifle the DPRK by force has entered a more dangerous phase.
					
					If they ignite a war in the Korean Peninsula, the revolutionary forces of the DPRK will smash the provokers without mercy.

articles.title: Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Message of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday received a message of thanks from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					The message said that Kim Jong Un sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 198.3 million yen on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					It extended highest glory and thanks to Kim Jong Un who showed deep loving care for the development of the democratic national education, representing the boundless reverence and intense loyalty of the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan to him.
					
					It expressed their determination to devotedly defend Kim Jong Un, firmly protect the motherland and preserve well the Chongryon organization, a precious legacy of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and the democratic national education.
					
					It wished good health to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Juche cause and tender-hearted father of the Koreans and school youth and children in Japan.

articles.title: Low Temperature Lingers in Korea
articles.content:
Low Temperature Lingers in Korea
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Low temperature lingers in most areas of Korea.
					The average temperature in March was registered 0.7 degrees Celsius, 0.9 degrees lower than the average year.
					
					Early in April, most areas on the west coast and some areas on the east coast witnessed 5 to 7 degrees C and the northern inland area and the tableland 0 to 2.5 degrees C, 2 to 3 degrees lower than the average year.
					
					This is an all-time low since 1981, except the record of 3.7 degrees in 1996 and 4.2 degrees in 1993. 
					
					Precipitation was 18.6 mm in March and 18.1 mm early in April, 6.5 mm and 5.3 mm lower respectively than last year. 
					
					Most areas of the country had snow and rain on March 12, 19 and 20 and April 6 because of low temperature. And wind with speed of more than 10 meters per second frequently hit most areas on the east and west coasts. 
					
					Such phenomenon is attributable to the expansion of arctic cold air to middle latitude, affected by global climate change in recent years which brought change in balance of atmospheric circulation.
					
					Chilly weather is expected to persist in most areas of the country till April 27, with 8 to 12 degrees C on an average, 0.5 degrees lower than the average year. From early May, the temperature will go up to 10-15 degrees C with the warm air from the south.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Decries U.S. Claim for Dialogue
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Decries U.S. Claim for Dialogue
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is trying to give impression that it restrains military action and hopes for dialogue.
					The present U.S. chief executive has become vocal about the step he has taken to stop a series of military exercises, while claiming that "the U.S. has no intention to attack north Korea" and the "U.S. duty is to prevent a war".
					
					This is a trick to evade the responsibility for the wartime situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula and shift the blame on to the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. is a chief culprit and a provoker which stoked tension and created the vicious cycle on the Korean Peninsula while tightening "sanctions" on the DPRK and moving to provoke a nuclear war.
					
					It was the U.S. which hurt the dignity of the DPRK with brazen-faced political provocation while incriminating the legitimate and peaceful satellite launch of the DPRK. It was again the U.S. which is staging the nuclear war rehearsal to remove socialist Korea from the earth.
					
					The U.S. has been waging military exercises in the sky and sea of the Korean Peninsula for nearly two months with the involvement of strategic nuclear submarines and bombers, apparently creating a nuclear war atmosphere.
					
					However, it is now crying out for dialogue and restraint of military actions, a sophism that can be made only by gangsters.
					
					Even at this moment the U.S. is waging nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK and is moving its nuclear strike means to operational waters off the peninsula.
					
					It even mulls launching an intercontinental ballistic missile, one of three strategic nuclear strike means.
					
					Under this situation, the U.S. has become vocal about a U-turn made by it toward dialogue and negotiation. This is aimed to convince the public that the U.S. does something to ease the tension on the Korean Peninsula, and round off nuclear war preparations behind the scene.
					
					There can be neither DPRK-U.S. dialogue nor denuclearization as long as the U.S. wantonly violates the sovereignty of the DPRK and persists in the moves for a nuclear war against it.
					
					As long as imperialists exist on earth and nuclear threats from the U.S. have not diminished, the DPRK's dismantlement of nuclear deterrence for self-defence will be unimaginable and there can never be such a thing no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					The DPRK declared its new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force and legalized it.
					
					The DPRK's nuclear deterrence, symbol of its dignity and sovereignty, can never be a political bargaining chip.
					
					The nuclear force of the DPRK will remain as the most powerful means for safeguarding the sovereignty and the supreme interests of the DPRK and dealing retaliatory blows at the strongholds of enemies who seek aggression on the DPRK till the world, especially the U.S., has become denuclearized.

articles.title: Root Cause of Tension on Korean Peninsula Is U.S.: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Root Cause of Tension on Korean Peninsula Is U.S.: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is massively beefing up war forces including nuclear strike means on the Korean Peninsula and in waters off it.
					Denouncing this, a bylined commentary of Minju Joson Friday says:
					
					This has turned the Korean Peninsula and areas around it into the world's biggest hotspot beset with the danger of the outbreak of a nuclear war in view of the density of the deployment of nuclear force.
					
					The recent U.S. military movement around the Korean Peninsula proves that the U.S. moves have entered into the phase of practical implementation with an aim at the provocation of a nuclear war.
					
					The root cause of the problem lies in none other than the U.S.
					
					The U.S. divided the Korean nation into two to realize its strategy for world domination. It has seriously threatened the sovereignty and security of the DPRK, while pursuing hostile policy toward it. The DPRK was forced to access the means for existence and self-defence.
					
					It also laid out a line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force. This is attributable to the U.S. ambition to stifle the DPRK.
					
					The U.S., displeased with the DPRK's nuclear weaponization, is charging it with "violation of resolution" and "challenge". This is a groundless slandering and calumny.
					
					For decades the U.S. has worked viciously to stifle the DPRK, while threatening it. It, however, has shelved its criminal past and loudly spoken ill of the DPRK's nuclear weaponization.
					
					This is a product of its plot to force the DPRK to lay down arms and attain with ease its ambition to stifle the DPRK.
					
					Now that the U.S. has taken every opportunity to pull up the DPRK, its army and people are hardening their determination to take a countermeasure stronger than nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increased Production
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increased Production
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially calls on all people to put spurs to the building of a thriving nation in hearty response to the torch for increased production lit at the Chollima Steel Complex in Kangson. Thus they should resolutely foil the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to invade the DPRK and fully demonstrate Songun Korea's spirit of bringing about leaping advance and prosperity, says the newspaper.
					Officials and workers of the Complex not only overfulfilled their steel production plan for the first quarter of this year but honored ahead of schedule their commitment to increased steel production proposed by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					The drive for increased production in Kangson serves as an engine for achieving greater success in the building of a thriving nation by dint of single-minded unity and a banner for dynamically pushing forward an all-people drive to carry out the WPK's new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					The workers in Kangson have extraordinary resolution to live up to the trust reposed by the leader in them with noble conscience and moral obligation, regarding it as dear as their own lives and they have the unshakable will to unconditionally honor their tasks ahead of schedule even at the risk of their own lives.  This is their fighting spirit.  It was thanks to this intense loyalty that they could bring about such innovation as ensuring five successive charges of ingot steel, not wedded to the existing conception, markedly reducing the time of steelmaking at the UHP electric arc furnace, and keeping the production at a high rate even in winter.
					
					It is the unanimous desire and target of struggle for the workers in Kangson to become standard bearers, members of shock brigade and mainstays in carrying out the WPK's new line by boosting the production of irons and steels needed for economic construction and the development of the country's defence capability.
					
					All people are called upon to give fullest play to their mental power in thoroughly implementing the Party's policies by learning from the workers in Kangson. This is the way of fully demonstrating the validity and vitality of the Party's new line and the dignity and might of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Charade to Mislead Public Opinion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Charade to Mislead Public Opinion
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- It is the main purpose of the U.S. to escalate its false propaganda for another Korean war by craftily abusing the mentality of reporters seeking scoops, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					It goes on:
					
					A lot of reporters are flying into the south of the Korean Peninsula from different parts of the world as a touch-and-go situation is prevailing there.
					
					What merits attention is that most of them are experts on disputes. This suggests the gravity of the tense situation on the peninsula, the focus of world attention.
					
					It is true that Koreans in the north and the south are leveling their guns at each other.
					
					But it is quite simple way of thinking to consider a war that may break out on the peninsula as one of frequent fratricidal disputes in different parts of the world. If you are media persons who regard impartiality and justice as your life and soul, you should clearly see through the essence of the Korean war which is misinterpreted as a national conflict.
					
					The U.S. is busy misleading the public opinion by claiming that the second Korean war would be a dispute between Koreans in a bid to conceal its true colors as harasser of peace and aggressor. By painting the DPRK as a provoker of war, the U.S. seeks to falsify the truth about the war to be started by it according to its carefully worked out scenario for invading the DPRK and justify its undisguised armed intervention in the name of the UN.
					
					The U.S. imperialists did so during the Korean War in the 1950s. By abusing the name of UN, the U.S. shifted the blame for the war on to the DPRK. They employed all means and methods to attain their goal of putting the whole of Korea under their military occupation. They mobilized for the war one third of its ground force, one fifth of its air force, most of its Pacific Fleet and troops of its 15 satellite countries under the berets of "UN forces."
					
					Red herring is a curtain raiser to the U.S. imperialists' full-scale armed invasion. A huge press corps busy in south Korea indicates once again that the curtain has been raised for implementing the scenario for another Korean war worked out by the U.S. imperialists together with the south Korean stooges.

articles.title: U.S. Call for "Dialogue" Is Deceptive: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Call for "Dialogue" Is Deceptive: News Analyst
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- An acute situation that has persisted on the Korean Peninsula since the end of last year is now putting the peninsula on the verge of war.
					Much upset by the developments, the United States on April 11 reportedly stated in public of its intention to seek a negotiated and diplomatic settlement of the situation.
					
					It may be a political decision out of its calculation that it can never bring the Democratic People's Republic of Korea into submission with military threats and "sanctions". But matter is that the U.S. raised preconditions for starting dialogue.
					
					The preconditions include a stop to "provocative" remarks which the DPRK has so far been engaged in and a demonstration of its will to realize denuclearization and suspend missile launch.
					
					There is a Korean saying which goes "Thief calls stop thief".
					
					It is none other than the U.S which sparked off a vicious cycle of tension, pursuant to its hostile policy to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, and pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase.
					
					The U.S. called the DPRK's recent working satellite launch a "missile launch" and cooked up UN Security Council's "resolutions on sanctions", making extra-large provocative moves against the DPRK by mobilizing colonial war servants.
					
					Still worse, it has run amuck for military provocation with nuclear strike means against the DPRK for nearly two months.
					
					The U.S. brought to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war drills super-large nuclear-powered carrier task forces, nuclear-powered submarines, guided-missile destroyers and even F-22 Stealth fighter formation. Furthermore it secretly dispatched nuclear-powered carrier Stennis, operational in the Indian Ocean, and Nimitz, anchored at a base of its mainland, to waters adjacent to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					After all, the Korean Peninsula and areas around it have turned into the world's biggest hotspot beset with the danger of a nuclear war in view of the density of the deployment of nuclear force.
					
					As seen above, the U.S. is the very one that has stepped up a military provocation in an all-round way, which now has reached the most dangerous phase of nuclear blackmail. Such being the case, it termed the DPRK a "provoker".
					
					At present, more than 280 reporters are flying into the south of the Korean Peninsula from different parts of the world. This suggests the gravity of the tense situation on the peninsula, the focus of world attention.
					
					If they are true media persons based on objectivity and impartiality, they will come to clearly know that the U.S. rhetoric about "dialogue" is deceptive one aimed to mislead the world public.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Hypocrisy over Issue of Registration Fee Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Hypocrisy over Issue of Registration Fee Blasted
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students held a press conference in Seoul on April 14, accusing the south Korean puppet regime of its hypocrisy over the issue of registration fee, according south Korean CBS.
					The present chief executive of south Korea put forward the halving of registration fee as her election commitment but this is not included among the "tasks of the state administration," the organization charged.
					
					It urged the "government" to honestly fulfill the commitment and settle the issue of registration fee.

articles.title: Anti-War Action Staged in Kwangju, S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-War Action Staged in Kwangju, S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The action for peace against war is now under way in Kwangju City, south Korea.
					The Kwangju Consultative Council of Citizens Organizations held a press conference on Monday.
					
					The tension on the Korean Peninsula has gone beyond the danger line, it said, adding: The continued tension will have a baneful impact not only on Northeast Asia but on the rest of the world. Looking back on the disasters of the June 25 war, the outbreak of another war on the Korean Peninsula should not be allowed.
					
					Koreans in the south and the north and abroad and the peace-loving people of the world should intensify the solidarity action for peace against war on the peninsula.
					
					An action for peace against war was staged beside the former South Jolla Provincial Office in Kumnam Avenue, Kwangju City that day. It was sponsored by the Emergency Situation Council for Defusing the Danger of War and Ensuring Peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The participants declared they were convinced once again that dialogue was the only way of preventing a war and defending peace. 
					
					The U.S. and the present south Korean regime are now talking about "dialogue" with the north but their sincerity is skeptical, they said, adding that the action would start from Kumnam Avenue where shouts of the participants in the May 18 Popular Resistance are still heard and make the whole of Kwangju City swept by the waves of actions for peace against war.

articles.title: Peace Must Be Achieved on Korean Peninsula: S. Korean Organizations
articles.content:
Peace Must Be Achieved on Korean Peninsula: S. Korean Organizations
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- At least 70 women's organizations in south Korea including the Federation of Women's Organizations, the Women's Solidarity and the Women's Society for Achieving Peace released a declaration on peace on Tuesday.
					The escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula is arousing deep concern, the declaration said, and went on:
					
					This situation points to the unreasonableness of the armistice system and at the same time proves that distrust and confrontation will lead to a war.
					
					Security and happy life of women can be guaranteed only when peace is ensured on the peninsula and the south and the north are reunified. Women want establishment of peace mechanism and realization of denuclearization.
					
					The declaration demanded the U.S. have direct negotiations with the north in order to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement by peace one.
					
					It urged the south Korean regime to opt for dialogue to remove the distrust and confrontation with the north.
					
					It called upon people of all social standings to turn out in actions for peace against war to remove the danger of a nuclear war and realize peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: April Popular Uprising against Colonial, Fascist Rule in S. Korea
articles.content:
April Popular Uprising against Colonial, Fascist Rule in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- It has been 53 years after the April Popular Uprising was staged in south Korea against the U.S. and its stooges' colonial fascist rule.
					The uprising was an anti-U.S., anti-fascist mass resistance of youth, students and other people for an independent and democratic new politics, new life and national reunification. It proved the truth that any fascist regime dependent on pro-American flunkeyism is bound to fall into a ditch of history.
					
					Traitor Syngman Rhee of south Korea faked up the March 15, 1960, "presidential" election returns in a bid to stay in power any longer.
					
					Enraged at the fabrication, students and other residents in Masan rose up in an anti-Syngman Rhee action which rapidly developed into an uprising throughout south Korea.
					
					On April 19, university students and other people of different social strata in Seoul attacked, destroyed and set fire to the buildings of the puppet government organs and the U.S. colonial ruling agencies.
					
					The fierce uprising in most of cities and areas of south Korea, including Pusan, Inchon and Kwangju, stroke the U.S. imperialists and the traitorous clique with terror.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and the puppet clique mobilized troops to crack down on the uprisers while employing tricks of conciliation and deception. However the traitor Syngman Rhee fascist dictatorship went to collapse at last.
					
					Later, the gains made by the uprisers were spoiled by the U.S. and the pro-American conservatives. 
					
					Strengthening its system for domination over south Korea, the U.S. made the pro-American elements come to power in order to sow discord within the Korean nation. 
					
					It has also instigated the south Korean conservative authorities to stage large-scale anti-DPRK war drills, posing a serious threat to peace and security of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					At present the tense situation between the north and the south of Korea has been escalated to the utmost due to the behaviors of the ultra-right conservatives of south Korea, who are laying hurdles in the way for improvement of the bilateral relations, pursuant to the U.S. policy of aggression on the DPRK. 
					
					The situation urges all the Koreans to smash the U.S. and the traitorous forces' moves by inheriting the spirit of the uprisers who heroically fought for independence, democracy and reunification of the country.
					
					Only when the south Korean people wage a stubborn struggle in the April 19 spirit, is it possible to realize the nation's desire to live in a free and peaceful, reunified land.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Accused of DPRK-targeted War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Accused of DPRK-targeted War Drill
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The 19th combat flying corps of the south Korean puppet air force staged a war drill for invading the north in Chungju, North Chungchong Province, according to Yonhap News of south Korea Thursday.
					The warmongers have been busy with the drills for night attack, sorties, air operations, de-poisoning, etc. for four days.
					
					They claimed that the drills were aimed to establish a maximum combat posture to cope with "provocation" from someone.
					
					The group of traitors is persisting in military confrontation racket to bring the dark clouds of a war to hang over this land at any cost, far from making apology for all their hostile acts against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Regime Urged to Demonstrate Their Will for Dialogue
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Regime Urged to Demonstrate Their Will for Dialogue
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean puppet regime are now calling for dialogue and negotiations. But the call is no more than a trick to flee from the responsibility for the prevailing grave situation. 
					Upon receiving the statement issued by the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) in response to the call, the DPRK people are expressing full support for the practical measures clarified in the statement.
					
					Pak Hyong Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					The U.S. claim that it will opt for dialogue when the DPRK shows its will for denuclearization first has irritated me. 
					
					The U.S. has introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea from long ago to threaten the DPRK. Its persistent anti-DPRK policy and nuclear blackmail have compelled the DPRK to get access to nukes.
					
					It has launched the DPRK-targeted military exercises involving huge nuclear armed forces.
					
					Such being the fact, the U.S. has raised the DPRK's denuclearization as a precondition for dialogue.
					
					It is so shameless and imprudent behavior.
					
					Sonu Yong Chol, a worker of the Chollima Steel Complex, said:
					
					I have a clear memory of thrice-cursed acts committed by the south Korean puppet authorities at the instigation of the U.S., including the monstrous atrocity of burning portraits of great men symbolic of the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					If they have no will to apologize for all of such acts, we will settle accounts with them by dint of arms.
					
					Jong U Yong, a Pyongyang citizen, said:
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities labeled the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes as a "missile launch", thus terming it a "provoker".
					
					Overpowered by a series of tough countermeasures taken by the DPRK, they are now calling for dialogue.
					
					If they sincerely want to see the relaxed situation, they should thoroughly carry out the practical measures clarified in the statement of the Policy Department of the NDC, before anything else.
					
					Dialogue and negotiations are possible only through practical actions.

articles.title: U.S. Moves for Nuclear War under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves for Nuclear War under Fire
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A French political party and a Bulgarian institution released statements on April 10 and 11 in protest against the U.S. nuclear war provocation against the DPRK.
					The French Revolutionary Communist League said: 
					
					A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. imperialists' moves to ignite a new war against the DPRK.
					
					We vehemently denounce the war maneuvers of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers.
					
					We strongly urge the U.S. to immediately pull its forces of aggression out of south Korea and promptly come out for concluding a peace treaty proposed by the DPRK.
					
					We call upon all the progressives and peace-loving people in the world to conduct dynamic solidarity activities to check the moves of the U.S. to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, Bulgaria stated:
					
					It was totally illegal that the UN Security Council adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					The U.S. is staging large-scale joint military drills against the DPRK after introducing latest war hardware into south Korea. This was the main reason why the situation deteriorated so seriously on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					It is an entirely just measure for self-defence that the DPRK took a full combat posture to protect the country's sovereignty and security under such grim situation.
					
					We, friends of the DPRK, vehemently denounce the war maneuvers of the U.S. and its allies and extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their cause.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					They included meetings, lectures and round-table talks in Serbia, Pakistan and Ethiopia from April 8 to 10.
					
					The chairman of the Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun in his speech at a meeting praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding thinker and theoretician and great statesman in the 20th century who clearly indicated the way to be followed by mankind through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					The secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said in a lecture that Kim Il Sung founded the undying Juche idea, providing mankind with great ideological and theoretical wealth, and built a socialist state centered on the popular masses.
					
					He went on: Leader Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by Kim Il Sung and turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power possessed of nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un is leading the struggle of the Korean people to build a thriving nation and improve the standard of people's living, while shattering all moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK with his matchless grit and pluck.
					
					A director for the construction management of the Water Project Designing and Inspection Office of Ethiopia and other speakers lauded Kim Il Sung as the most distinguished leader in the 20th century who defeated two imperialisms in one generation and made a great contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					The DPRK is sure to win in the confrontation with the U.S. as long as there are the tremendous military muscle built by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the wise leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, they noted.
					
					A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held an event at the DPRK embassy in Tashkent on Monday, the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length painting of Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ju Yong Il, chairman of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, said in his speech the Day of the Sun, Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary, is the most significant holiday deeply cherished in the hearts of progressive mankind and overseas Koreans.
					
					The august name of Kim Il Sung will always be remembered by mankind for his feats performed for the country and its people, the era and revolution and his noble virtues, Ju noted.
					
					He expressed belief that the DPRK is sure to win and the future of the Korean nation is rosy thanks to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					He called upon overseas Koreans to join the compatriots in the homeland in the struggle for national reunification.
					
					The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held a similar event at the Korean Centre in Bishkek on Monday.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of the smiling Generalissimos in the office of the confederation and paid tribute to them.
					
					Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, in his speech praised Kim Il Sung as the great man of the century produced by the Korean nation. He went on:
					
					The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. I am convinced of victory and future thanks to him.
					
					Overseas Koreans will more dynamically struggle for the reunification of the country and the prosperity of the nation.
					
					Photo exhibitions were held at the events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by British Organizations
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint  statement on April 8 on the occasion of the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK.
					Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission a year ago was all Korean people's expression of deep trust in him and marked a historic event, the statement said.
					
					Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, it noted, and went on:
					
					He has demonstrated his distinguished leadership ability over the past one year. He published historic works which serve as important guidelines for advancing the Korean revolution along a straight road of victory under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. He has made ceaseless journey for field guidance to different parts of the country.
					
					Under his wise leadership Changjon Street was built in Pyongyang, cultural recreation grounds for people appeared in different parts of the country and Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was launched with success.
					
					He has wisely led the Korean people in their struggle to shatter the moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces to ignite a new war and achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					The Korean people will certainly reunify the country and win a final victory under his Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) - The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on April 9.
					The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed during their lifetimes. It also indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their idea and exploits.

articles.title: Dynamic Activities for Study and Dissemination of Kim Jong Un's Work Called for
articles.content:
Dynamic Activities for Study and Dissemination of Kim Jong Un's Work Called for
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 7 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party".
					The statement said that Kim Jong Un in his work stressed the need to hold fast to Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea. He also underscored the need to hold leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal general secretary of the WPK, it noted.
					
					Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as a compass indicating the way of winning a final victory in the Korean revolution, it pointed out.
					
					The work dealt a deadly blow at the imperialist reactionaries who talked about "change," "reform" and "opening" in the DPRK, it said.
					
					The work reflected the fixed will of the WPK and the Korean people to keep to the road indicated by Kim Jong Il, it noted, adding:
					
					We call upon the world progressives to conduct more dynamic activities for studying and disseminating the work of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Enlarged Edition of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Published
articles.content:
Enlarged Edition of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Published
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK published Vol. 19 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (enlarged edition) which comprehensively deals with works of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The book contains 45 works of Kim Jong Il including speeches, letters and talks he made public from January, Juche 86 (1997) to March, Juche 88 (1999).
					
					In the works "On Bringing about a Revolutionary Turn in Party Work This Year" and "On Some Immediate Issues Arising in Party Work and Economic Affair" he set forth the tasks and ways for improving the party work as required by the developing reality.
					
					"Strengthening the People's Army Is a Basic Guarantee for Triumphantly Accomplishing the Revolutionary Cause of Juche", "We Should Continue Directing Big Efforts to Strengthening the People's Army in the Idea of Attaching Importance to Arms" and other works indicated the tasks and ways for remarkably increasing the combat capability of the Korean People's Army.
					
					The ideas of preserving the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction and strictly abiding by the socialist principle were clarified in "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction", "On Strictly Observing Socialist Principle in All Fields of Revolution and Construction" and other works.
					
					The book also contains works giving perfect answers to ideological and theoretical issues arising in socialist construction such as the issue of achieving national reunification, the supreme desire of the nation, the issue of further developing the movement of Koreans in Japan, the issue of conducting class education well and the issue of dynamically pushing forward the land realignment.

articles.title: Presidente de Mongolia expone posicion de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente de Mongolia expone posicion de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, presidente de Mongolia, recibio el dia 16 las cartas credenciales de Hong Gyu, nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a acreditarse en ese pais.
					En la ocasion, el mandatario mongol dijo que su gobierno y pueblo no olvidaran el hecho de que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il prestaron siempre profunda atencion al desarrollo de relaciones de amistad Mongolia-Corea.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises se intensificaran y se desarrollaran tambien en el futuro bajo la atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Un, senalo el y subrayo:
					
					Nuestro gobierno mantiene la firme posicion de ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad Mongolia-Corea.
					
					Apoyo la politica de la RPDC tendente a reunificar el pais de manera independiente y por via pacifica.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a banda de traidores surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a banda de traidores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que a pesar de nuestras reiteradas advertencias, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos insulta cada dia mas en la etapa peor la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 19 una informacion no. 1031 como sigue:
					Cuando todos los coreanos celebraban con jubilo el Dia del Sol, los tipejos viejos de la "Alianza de Padres" y otros gangsteres conservadores derechistas mancharon sin titubeo en Seul la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Aunque cometieron el crimen que merece el castigo, los malditos titeres pronuncian sin vacilacion los disparates de toda indole para justificar su crimen.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos sueltan las palabras absurdas de que el ultimatum de nuestra Comandancia Suprema es "conducta dificil de entender" e insultaron la voluntad de venganza de nuestro ejercito y pueblo picoteando que hagan nobles palabras y acciones.
					
					Para colmo, los gangsteres de la capa militar encabezada por Kim Kwan Jin responden mas desafiantemente a nuestro ultimatum diciendo que "si el Norte provoca la guerra bajo cualquier  pretexto, castigara merecidamente".
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran correctamente que la locura de los gangsteres derechistas que mancharon nuestra maxima dignidad es la provocacion intencional y planificada para inculcar la confrontacion fratricida y la hostilidad y agravar mas la situacion y que el autor de este caso es indudablemente la autoridad titere.
					
					Hablar de "dialogo" amparando y fomentando el imperdonable crimen de gran tamano causa solo la gran indignacion.
					
					Sera una ilusion muy absurda si la banda traidora piensa en que pasaria con seguridad sin  pedir disculpa por haber insultado la maxima dignidad de la RPDC considerada por el ejercito y pueblo como vida mas preciosa.
					
					Como ya declararon, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC daran golpe demoledor a todos los enemigos que calumniaron nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					La horda titere debe saber correctamente que ha llegado el momento de su destino mas tragico.

articles.title: EE.UU. es manipulador trasero de actos provocativos, insiste ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. es manipulador trasero de actos provocativos, insiste ACNC
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- El crimen de los gangsteres recien perpetrado a plena luz en Seul, fue manipulado por Estados Unidos, que recurria a la politica de terror estatal hostilizando historicamente la idea y el regimen optados por el pueblo coreano e instigando a los titeres surcoreanos a aplastar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Ya en la decada de 1950, EE.UU. provoco la guerra sin precedente contra Corea y despues, se esforzo obstinadamente por aislar y aplastar el regimen de la RPDC tomandola como primer blanco de ataque.
					
					Al establecer los aparatos institucionales y legales para hostilizar a la RPDC, perpetro de modo abierto el ataque militar y la amenaza nuclear y ha mantenido la sancion economica y la presion internacional.
					
					Despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, establecio las relaciones diplomaticas con los paises socialistas de Europa Oriental, pero,  en cuanto a la RPDC nego establecerlas y llamar siquiera el nombre oficial del pais.
					
					Despues del ingreso de la RPDC en la ONU, solo EE.UU. no la consideraba como pais para poder coexistir en la sociedad internacional.
					
					En la decada de 1990 del siglo pasado, invento el rumor  de "amenaza nuclear", con lo cual elevo el grado de aplastamiento anti-RPDC y se valio de todas las maneras y medios, entre otras la presion militar, la penetracion ideologica y cultural, el aislamiento politico y diplomatico, el bloqueo economico.
					
					En el siglo XXI, puso la RPDC en la lista de objetos de ataque nuclear preventivo y el gobernante expuso en su discurso politico la abierta amenaza de ataque nuclear preventivo.
					
					A decir verdad, esto es una declaracion de guerra y un peligroso terror estatal contra la RPDC.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de la "reubicacion de las fuerzas armadas", EE.UU. introdujo en el Sur de Corea gran cantidad de armamentos ultramodernos de guerra y libro anualmente los ejercicios militares conjuntos movilizando las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes en el Sur de Corea y estacionadas en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana y las fuerzas armadas en su territorio principal.
					
					Los hechos demuestran a que grado llego la intriga del terror estatal de EE.UU.
					
					Recientemente, en contubernio con los titeres surcoreanos, desarrollo el tiro nunca visto contra la bandera nacional de la RPDC.
					
					Ademas, manipulo al organo de inteligencia del Sur de Corea para destruir las estatuas de bronce  de los grandes hombres.
					
					El terrorista Jon Yong Chol revelo que EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas controlan y manipulan detras de la cortina los casos terroristas de las entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC inclusive "Frente por la Liberacion del Pueblo Norcoreano" y "Sociedad para Destruir las Estatuas de Bronce".
					
					Luego de trazar con los gangsteres militares del Sur de Corea el plan operacional de destruir los monumentos de eternidad y elogio a los lideres en el marco de los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", EE.UU. se desespera por realizarlo.
					
					El presente caso imperdonable constituye un crimen cometido bajo el amparo y manipulacion de EE.UU.
					
					Los hechos comprueban que EE.UU. esta detras de todos los casos provocativos pequenos y grandes que se desarrollan en la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: EE.UU. es responsable de tension de Peninsula Coreana, destaca Minju Joson
articles.content:
EE.UU. es responsable de tension de Peninsula Coreana, destaca Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual insertado hoy, el rotativo Minju Joson condena a Estados Unidos que ubica gran cantidad de las fuerzas belicas incluyendo los medios de ataque nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					Como resultado, esta region se convirtio en la mayor zona termonuclear del mundo tanto en la densidad de emplazamiento de fuerzas armadas nucleares como en la peligrosidad de estallido de guerra nuclear, anade y prosigue:
					
					El reciente movimiento militar de EE.UU. en torno a la Peninsula Coreana muestra que este ya decidio la provocacion de guerra nuclear y paso a las acciones practicas.
					
					La causa raigal de ese problema reside en EE.UU.
					
					Para realizar su estrategia de hegemonia mundial, EE.UU. dividio en dos partes la nacion coreana, practico la politica hostil anti-RPDC y amenazo seriamente la soberania y la seguridad de esta. Por lo tanto, nos vimos obligados a equiparnos inevitablemente con los medios autodefensivos para defender nuestra existencia.
					
					Particularmente, hemos dotado de fuerzas armadas nucleares y presentado la linea de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas nucleares porque EE.UU. no ha abandonado su ambicion de aplastarnos.
					
					Muy disgustado ante nuestra posesion de armas nucleares, el imperio yanqui nos acusa de "violacion de resolucion" y "desafio", lo cual es el absurdo insulto contra nosotros.
					
					EE.UU. hace la vista gorda en cuanto a sus crimenes cometidos durante los decenios pasados para amenazar y aplastar la RPDC y solamente vocifera sobre el armamento nuclear de esta.
					
					Tal proceder no pasa de ser el producto de sus conspiraciones para desarmar a la RPDC y asi lograr facilmente su ambicion de aplastarla.
					
					Dado que EE.UU. sigue ofendiendonos, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC tienen la voluntad de poseer lo mas poderoso  que las armas nucleares.

articles.title: Desviacion de opinion publica es metodo anacronico de EE.UU., subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Desviacion de opinion publica es metodo anacronico de EE.UU., subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual del dia 19, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que Estados Unidos trata de elevar el grado de desinformacion para la guerra coreana abusando de la psicologia de los periodistas que buscan las noticias especiales.
					Ahora en la parte surena de la Peninsula Coreana en visperas de la guerra estan congregados los periodistas provenientes de diversos lugares del mundo, senala el articulo y prosigue:
					
					La mayoria de ellos son los especialistas en conflictos, lo cual insinua que persigue EE.UU. en la situacion candente de la Peninsula Coreana, donde esta concentrado el foco de interes de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Es verdad que la nacion coreana esta dividida en dos partes apuntando uno contra otro sus fusiles.
					
					Pero, si alguien considera la guerra a ser estallada en este territorio como un conflicto fratricida que suele desatarse en la sociedad internacional, esto seria un pensamiento  demasiado simple.
					
					Si aquellos son periodistas que toman como vida la imparcialidad y la justicia, tendran que analizar correctamente la esencia de la guerra coreana, conocida erroneamente como conflicto fratricida.
					
					EE.UU. desvia la opinion publica describiendo la segunda guerra coreana como conflicto fratricida con el objetivo de encubrir su naturaleza y destructor de la paz e invasor. Al tildar la RPDC de provocadora de guerra, el imperio yanqui pretende tergiversar la verdad de guerra agresiva a desatarse segun el detallado plan de agresion a la RPDC y justificar su intervencion armada abusando del nombre de la ONU.
					
					En la pasada guerra coreana de la decada de 1950, EE.UU. hizo como ahora. En aquel entonces, los yanquis imputaron a la RPDC desde el primer dia de la guerra la responsabilidad del estallido de guerra abusando del nombre de la ONU y movilizo un tercio de sus fuerzas terrestres, un quinto de las fuerzas aereas, la mayoria de la flotilla naval del Oceano Pacifico y hasta los ejercitos de 15 Estados satelites bajo el casco de las "Fuerzas de la ONU". Asi se valio de los medios y metodos de toda clase para realizar su intencion de agresion militar a todo el territorio coreano.
					
					La campana de desviacion de opinion publica es el preludio de agresion armada de EE.UU.
					
					La concentracion de periodistas en el suelo surcoreano comprueba otra vez que ya se levanto el telon de la guerra coreana preparada por el imperialismo yanqui en contubernio con sus lacayos.
